original_text: but you shall cling to the Lord your God just as you have done to this day.
korean_text: 오직 너희의 하나님 여호와께 가까이 하기를 오늘까지 행한 것 같이 하라

sentences.original_text: but you shall cling to the Lord your God
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너희는 주 너희 하나님을 붙잡으라

sentences.original_text: just as you have done to this day
